name: Assassin's Creed III: Liberation - Remastered
storyline: Assassin's Creed III: Liberation Remastered takes place between 1765-1780. The main character of this game is called Aveline de Gandpré. She is fighting for freedom and justice under the guidance of Agate - a former slave and a master of the Assassin Brotherhood in New Orleans. Although the title lacks references to Desmond Miles' adventures, Connor, the main character of Assassin's Creed III, appears in it. Moreover, it is worth mentioning that the whole game is stylized on a propaganda product developed by the evil Abstergo corporation.
summary:
Assassin's Creed III: Liberation Remastered is a remastered version of Assassin's Creed III: Liberation.
The original game, developed by Ubisoft Sofia, made its debut on PlayStation Vita in 2012. Two years later, it received its HD version, released on PC, PlayStation 3, and Xbox 360.
This version incluide new character models, polished environment rendering, and more.
Gameplay mechanics have been revamped as well, improving your experience and your immersion.
